title: An Instant Classic in Lambeau, Mahomes and the Chiefs Shine, and More Week 1 Takeaways | The Ringer NFL Show (Ep. 297)
description:
With the regular season underway, The Ringer’s Robert Mays and Kevin Clark link up to discuss Aaron Rodgers’s legendary comeback and Mitchell Trubisky and the Bears’ second-half collapse (1:00). Then, the guys introduce new weekly segments to the show where they cover players and teams whose values are trending up or down (18:00), point out the most questionable decisions from around the league on Sunday, and predict the stories that will lead tomorrow’s headlines (45:00).

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
